paragraphs.name: 24fe
paragraphs.text: Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks: the latest advance in Neural Networks, simply explained

paragraphs.name: f754
paragraphs.text: The new type of network that is making waves in the ML world.

paragraphs.name: e011
paragraphs.text: Comparison of the MLP and the KAN. Image from paper.

paragraphs.name: a59a
paragraphs.text: In April, a paper appeared on arXiv named: KAN: Kolmogorov–Arnold Networks. The tweet announcing got ~5k likes, which for a paper announcement is pretty viral. The accompanying GitHub repository already has 7.6k stars and counting.

mediaResource.title: Ziming Liu on Twitter: "MLPs are so foundational, but are there alternatives? MLPs place activation functions on neurons, but can we instead place (learnable) activation functions on weights? Yes, we KAN! We propose Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks (KAN), which are more accurate and interpretable than MLPs.🧵 pic.twitter.com/4Soe2M7NfG / Twitter"

paragraphs.name: 7ec5
paragraphs.text: The Kolmogorov-Arnold Network (KAN) is a brand-new class of Neural Network building block. It…

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: The new type of network that is making waves in the ML world.

post.title: Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks: the latest advance in Neural Networks, simply explained

paragraphs.text: Revisiting ‘Town Without Pity’ as a Moral Yardstick

paragraphs.name: b45e
paragraphs.text: It is a moral period piece that shows us just how bad things used to be not that long ago, while challenging us to be aware of what might still need to be changed.

paragraphs.name: 1a34
paragraphs.text: Photo credit: iStock

paragraphs.name: 28e9
paragraphs.text: By Daniel Gauss

paragraphs.name: 78d8
paragraphs.text: If nothing else, Town Without Pity is an interesting cultural or historical document, as much of what happens in this film could clearly not happen today. Indeed, it works as an effective and somewhat reassuring moral assessment tool which shows us how far we have come in…

paragraphs.name: 79aa

paragraphs.text: From Pen and Paper to Website in Minutes for Free?— Leveraging GPT-4o

paragraphs.name: c4d4
paragraphs.text: Image by kenshinstock on Freepik

OpenAI has announced the release of its brand new model, GPT-4o (o standing for ‘Omni’). Besides many advanced and exciting features in computer vision, real-time translation, or the education field, free users will particularly love one announcement: GPT4-o is available for free users! 
What does it mean? With multimodality, any…

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: GPT-4o is now out and free. Can it create a professional website, starting from my pen & paper sketch? Let’s find out!

post.title: From Pen and Paper to Website in Minutes for Free?— Leveraging GPT-4o
